With multiple cats, finding a litter that controls odor and clumps well is essential‚Äîand Tidy Cats delivers on both fronts.üëç Pros:‚Ä¢ Excellent Odor Control: Even with two cats, the litter keeps smells at bay for days. The ammonia blocker really works.‚Ä¢ Strong Clumping: Makes scooping easy and keeps the box cleaner longer.‚Ä¢ Low Dust: Compared to other brands, it‚Äôs noticeably less dusty, which is great for my cats and my lungs.‚Ä¢ Affordable & Widely Available: Easy to find in stores and reasonably priced for the quality.üëé Cons:‚Ä¢ Heavy Container: The larger tubs can be a bit bulky to handle.‚Ä¢ Tracking: Some granules still end up outside the box, though not as bad as others I‚Äôve tried.Overall Verdict:Tidy Cats is a reliable, effective litter that balances performance and price.
